title: Traptrix Allomerus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, you may select one person. If they die tonight, they instead don't die, and their wincon changes to “Slay everybody who would oppose you”. (Costs 1 charge.)
- You may lose 2 charges to revive a dead traptrix player. They cannot be lynched the day they are revived.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - The people you convert get access to traptrix factional chat.
